rules.content: When this creature enters or attacks, you may pay {r}{r} to exile another creature card from your hand. You may cast those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and they costs {r}{r} (or {1}{r}, or {2}) less to cast. When this creature leaves the battlefield, put the exiled cards into their owner's hands.
Whenever ~ entices a card, deal 3 damage to target creature an opponent{lns}controls.
